DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study For Orally-Disintegrating Tablet Of Sildenafil
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male subject age 20 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Baseline orthostatic hypotension define > =20 mm Hg reduction systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , > =10 mm Hg reduction diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) development significant postural symptom ( dizziness , lightheadedness , vertigo ) go supine stand position . Subjects currently prescribe take nitrate nitric oxide donor form either regular intermittent basis .
